entities.name: house
entities.description: The House of Gaunt is mentioned as a location where someone has nailed a dead snake to the front door.

entities.name: ogden
entities.description: Ogden is introduced as a person who is startled by the stranger and backs away several paces before speaking.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who thinks Ogden is being dim for not understanding the stranger.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is introduced as an organization that Harry claims to be from.

entities.name: stranger
entities.description: The stranger is described as a person with thick hair, missing teeth, and small dark eyes that stare in opposite directions.

relationships.description: Ogden is frightened by the stranger's appearance.
Harry thinks Ogden is being dim for not understanding the stranger.
The stranger is standing at the front door of the House of Gaunt.
